successes.title: Voltera:  Your Circuit Board Prototyping Machine
successes.description: Print your circuit boards, dispense solder paste, and reflow!  The Voltera V-One lets you go from concept to creation in minutes.

Pledges.description: BEVERAGE BACKER - Think we're doing a great job or that this technology needs to exist?  Buy us a coffee/tea/beer/milkshake and we'll keep you in the loop with exclusive behind the scenes updates to the project!
ELECTRONICS RULER - A handy ruler and electronics helper. Branded with the KS logo so everyone knows you supported us before it was cool!
MAKER T-SHIRT - We all love building things and have the tools to prove it. Flaunt your passion!
EARLY BIRD (Batch 1) - Best price and best ship date means best value! See the FAQ for shipping details.
EARLY BIRD (Batch 2) - Early Bird gets the least expensive worm! See the FAQ for shipping details.
VOLTERA V-ONE (Batch 2) - Special KS price.  It will be going up after this! See the FAQ for shipping details.
I CAN'T WAIT! (Batch 1) - Make sure you get one of the first Voltera printers made and some free swag as well! See the FAQ for shipping details.
